mapper.select: SELECT CALENDAR_DATE, COURSE_NAME, BURN_KCAL, DISTANCE FROM DAILYEXERCISERECORD DER, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS TODAY FROM DUAL) T WHERE TO_CHAR(DER.CALENDAR_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = T.TODAY AND MEMBER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY DISTANCE DESC

SELECT SUM(K) TOTAL_BURN_KCAL, SUM(D) TOTAL_DISTANCE FROM ( SELECT DER.CALENDAR_DATE, DER.COURSE_NAME, DER.BURN_KCAL K, DER.DISTANCE D FROM MEMBER M, DAILYEXERCISERECORD DER, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS TODAY FROM DUAL) T WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = DER.MEMBER_NO AND TO_CHAR(DER.CALENDAR_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = T.TODAY AND DER.MEMBER_NO = #{no} )
